ceoSection.title:
Pioneering the Future
of Technology
ceoSection.name: Kohie Yoshida
ceoSection.quote: At Genesis, we believe technology is not just a tool — it is the bridge between ambition and impact. Our mission has always been to empower businesses across the globe with forward-thinking solutions that drive real, measurable transformation. From Japan to India to the UAE, we are building a network of innovation that transcends borders. Every partnership we forge, every project we deliver, is a step toward a more connected and resilient future. The world is evolving faster than ever, and we are proud to be at the forefront — pioneering what comes next.

ph.name: Praful Hambarde
ph.role: Advisory Member / IIT Mandi Assistant Professor

joinUsSection.title: Build the Future of <1>Human-Machine Synergy.</1>
joinUsSection.subtitle: We're assembling a world-class team across AI, Web3, and autonomous systems. If you thrive at the edge of what's possible — we want to hear from you.

genR01.title: Lead AI Robustness Engineer
genR01.description: Design and implement adversarial testing frameworks to ensure reliability, safety, and fairness across production-grade AI systems.

genR02.title: Cardano Blockchain Architect
genR02.description: Architect and deploy smart contracts and dApps on the Cardano ecosystem, bridging enterprise use-cases with decentralized infrastructure.

genR03.title: Autonomous Drone Systems Dev
genR03.description: Develop flight control software and real-time perception pipelines for autonomous UAV platforms operating in complex environments.

genR04.title: Research Intern
genR04.description: Contribute to applied research initiatives at the intersection of AI, defence tech, and next-generation computing under senior mentorship.

bottomCta.text: Don't see your role? We're always looking for exceptional people.

tx001.headline: IDEATHON — Genesis x IIT Mandi
tx001.summary: Genesis Group is proud to announce IDEATHON, a flagship innovation challenge happening at IIT Mandi in April 2026. Bringing together top student minds and industry experts, the event will feature intensive problem-solving rounds, mentorship sessions, and hands-on workshops spanning AI, drone technology, and sustainable engineering. Participants will compete to build real-world solutions under the guidance of Genesis engineers and academic mentors. Stay tuned for registration details and more updates.

faxAI.title: FAX (PDF) Transcription AI
faxAI.desc: AI-OCR combined with LLM-based context correction and formatting for accurate digitization of handwritten and printed documents.
list: Integration with DB / kintone & business systems

ragAI.title: Executive RAG AI
ragAI.desc: Internal knowledge search and decision support — builds a RAG knowledge base over internal documents so executives can query in natural language.
list: RAG knowledge base over internal documents & data

kintoneBot.title: LLM Chatbot on kintone
kintoneBot.desc: A kintone-integrated chatbot that automates app creation and modifications through natural-language instructions via LLM API and kintone REST API.
list: LLM API + kintone REST API integration

steps.step1_desc: We consult with Japanese clients to define project scope, technical requirements, and vet the project through Edify Japan.
steps.step2_desc: The project is routed to the Edify Bharat branch, where we match the requirements with specialized IIT researchers and engineers.
steps.step3_desc: Our dedicated engineering teams execute the project with active coordination, offering time-and-materials or fixed-price development with regular progress reporting.
steps.step4_desc: Final deliverables undergo ISO-inspired quality assurance and data security checks before handover and feedback collection.

social_page.free_badge: Cross-Border Social Initiative by GENESIS Group
mission_points: Cultivating a conscious society through accessible wellness programs.
Bridging the gap between modern technology and ancient wisdom.
Empowering individuals regardless of socioeconomic background.
Building long-term community resilience through mindful practices.
social_page.featured_desc1: This initiative aims to provide a supportive environment for people from both countries to work effectively in each other's country, fostering deeper collaboration between India and Japan.
social_page.featured_desc2: Through this mission, we are trying to overcome present drawbacks, encourage both societies to interact with each other, and grow together.
